abilities.name: Computational Mastermind
abilities.rule: At the end of your Command phase, before you determine if units from your army have Hostile Acquisition or Fortify Takeover, for each objective marker you control that has one or more models with this ability within range of it, you can spend 1YP or gain 1YP.

abilities.name: Predictive Guidance
abilities.rule: Once per battle round, this model can use this ability. If it does, you can target this unit with the Fire Overwatch or Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP.
